data.title: Michael Caine
data.text: A selection of scripts and related material associated with the career of camera operator Dusty Miller including: a revised film script for Get Carter, the screenplay by Mike Hodges ...based on the novel "Jack's Return Home" by Ted Lewis.., 130pp of mimeographed typescript, original burgundy paper wrappers, the title page giving the film's working title "CARTER'S THE NAME", 30th June, 1970, signed in blue ballpoint pen by Michael Caine, the director Mike Hodges, the producer Michael Klinger and actress Dorothy White; accompanied by a typescript letter, signed, from Michael Klinger to Dusty Miller on Michael Caine Is Carter headed stationery, 28th August, 1970, thanking him for ...the excellent work you have done on this production 1p. and corresponding envelope; a script for the film Pulp, 112pp of mimeographed typescript, original red paper wrappers, the title page bearing the film's working title Memoirs Of A Ghost Writer, 17th November, 1971, signed by various cast and crew members in different inks, including Mickey Rooney, Lizabeth Scott and writer/director Mike Hodges, additionally inscribed by Hodges Thank you for coming to my funeral; a mimeographed call sheet for Pulp, 22nd December, 1971 and five colour snap-shots of the funeral scene, all -- 3½x4¼in. (9x10.8cm.) (9)
